mcknighte.controller

Class AppointmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mcknighte.common.MessageController
      • mcknighte.common.AbstractController<Appointment,AppointmentFacade>
        • mcknighte.controller.AppointmentController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Named(value="appointmentController")
 @SessionScoped
public class AppointmentController
extends AbstractController<Appointment,AppointmentFacade>
    AppointmentController, controller class to act as middle man between Appointment views and the business logic
    Since:
    2017
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Edward McKnight (UP608985)
    See Also:
    AbstractController, ClientController, Serialized Form
